amendment.description: Amedment requires the TSA, within 6 months of enactment, to submit a report to Congress on complaints and claims received by the TSA for loss of property with respect to passenger baggage screened by the TSA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-127 to require the TSA, within 6 months of enactment, to submit a report to Congress on complaints and claims received by the TSA for loss of property with respect to passenger baggage screened by the TSA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
